title: Two injured in Bridgeport shooting
content:
BRIDGEPORT, CT (WFSB) -
Two people were shot in Bridgeport on Saturday, authorities confirmed to Eyewitness News.
The shooting took place near the intersection of Anson and Salem streets around 10:30 p.m.
Police told Eyewitness News the victims are possibly a daughter and a mother.
There is no word yet on the extent of their injuries or on any suspects.
The shooting is under investigation.
